backend/main.mo: Defines core backend data types and maps, handles user profiles, habit library, activity entries, pattern storage, programs, and enforces access control and blob storage integration.
backend/migration.mo: Provides a simple migration module that returns old state unchanged.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence reports mapping feature IDs to affected files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries of numerous frontend files for build or documentation reference.
frontend/index.css: Sets up Tailwind CSS base layers and defines extensive light/dark theme CSS variables for the app.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
Implements heuristic calculations for emotional trends, spending triggers, time-of-day distribution, and insight signatures from patterns and activity entries.
frontend/src/analysis/detectPatterns.ts: Implements keyword‑based pattern detection on text, computing confidences and extracting snippets for several behavior categories.
frontend/src/analysis/patternTypes.ts: Defines pattern type constants with ids, titles, and descriptions used in analysis.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app handling authentication, routing between views, onboarding, profile setup, and layout.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Renders a login/logout button using Internet Identity, handling auth state and query cache clearing.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Displays a modal for entering and saving a user’s name during profile setup.
frontend/src/components/common/AccessDen: Shows an access‑denied screen prompting the user to sign in.
frontend/src/components/entries/AddEntry: Provides a form to create a new activity entry with text, source, notes, and optional image upload.
frontend/src/components/entries/EntriesL: Lists activity entries with previews and allows navigating to entry details or adding a new entry.
frontend/src/components/entries/EntryDet: Shows full details of a selected entry, including text, image attachments, and an option to run analysis.
frontend/src/components/habits/HabitLibr: Displays the habit library grouped by category, seeding defaults if empty and rendering each habit with details.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Provides the main app layout with header, navigation, content area, and footer, handling view navigation.
frontend/src/components/onboarding/Onboa: Shows a modal onboarding guide explaining how to add data, discover patterns, and start the program.
frontend/src/components/patterns/insight: Displays emotional trend percentages or a placeholder when insufficient data is available.
Displays time‑of‑day activity distribution with percentages, bars, and peak period insights, with fallback when no data exists.
Shows counts, averages, trends, and peak days for spending triggers, including warnings when triggers are high.
frontend/src/components/patterns/Pattern: Fetches patterns and entries, computes insights, and renders the pattern dashboard with metrics and trend sections.
frontend/src/components/patterns/RunAnal: Runs pattern detection on entry text, saves detected patterns, and shows loading and toast feedback.
frontend/src/components/program/ProgramD: Renders detailed info for a specific program day, including task details, rationale, reflection, and user check‑ins.
frontend/src/components/program/ProgramV: Manages program display, auto‑updates based on insight changes, allows generating a new program, and shows day details.
frontend/src/components/today/ProgressSu: Summarizes user progress with completed days, streak, and average mood across program check‑ins.
frontend/src/components/today/TodayCheck: Provides daily check‑in form, loads existing check‑ins, handles submission, and shows state when no program exists.
frontend/src/data/habitLibrary.ts: Exports a predefined array of Habit objects grouped by categories such as Digital Balance and Spending Awareness.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Defines a hook that creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's Internet Identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a context and hooks for managing Internet Identity authentication, including login state, stored identities, and lifecycle behavior.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Implements React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user profiles, activity entries, patterns, habits, and programs through the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets Tailwind base styles and custom CSS variables for light/dark themes with a warm neutral color palette.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app by wrapping it with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
Summarizes Pattern objects by counting types, averaging confidence, and extracting top types and common snippets.
frontend/src/program/generateProgram.ts: Generates a 30‑day Program based on detected patterns, habit categories, and optional insight signals to select relevant habits and explanations.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides utilities for reading URL parameters, persisting them in sessionStorage, and cleaning them from the hash for routing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, fonts, shadows, animations, and plugin integrations for the frontend.
project_state.json: Defines the project’s current state, goals, requirements, known issues, and image update instructions for the self‑improvement app MVP.
